intro: Achimenes × escheri, commonly known as the hybrid gloxinia, is a tropical flowering plant native to the Americas. It is characterized by its striking, showy flowers that come in a variety of colors, including red, pink, and white. The plant has heart-shaped, velvety leaves that are typically dark green. It thrives in warm, humid environments and requires well-draining soil to prevent root rot. Achimenes × escheri is often cultivated as a decorative plant due to its ornamental value and vibrant blooms.
